## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AT-HSFA4A, HSF A4A</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA HEAT SHOCK TRANSCRIPTION FACTOR  A4A, heat shock transcription factor  A4A
- **Description:**   heat shock transcription factor A4A;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2117139
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
